articles.title: Ethereum 2.0 Upgrade Shows Promising Results
articles.summary: The latest Ethereum upgrade has significantly reduced gas fees and improved transaction throughput.

articles.title: Ethereum Layer 2 Solutions Gain Traction
articles.summary: Rollup technologies are helping Ethereum scale while maintaining security and decentralization.
